                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/CharChirico" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Cllr Charlotte (Charlie) Chirico</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/CharChirico">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">CharChirico</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Trinity Ward Cllr in SW19 &amp; Former Parliamentary Candidate for the Conservative Party in 2017. All views my own.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Wimbledon

        </span>
      </div>

        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">

      </div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="969307698444619776" id="stream-item-tweet-969307698444619776" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;969307698444619776&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="967740365167058944" id="stream-item-tweet-967740365167058944" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;967740365167058944&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I have objected to, Smash 82 The Broadway new licensing application for new hours (2am weekday, 3am weekend) to supply alcohol. Trinity Cllrs fighting against it for public safety reasons. Get your views into licensing@merton.gov.uk now before 1/3/18@MertonTories <a href="/Hayley_Ormrod" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="917823381826924545"><s>@</s><b>Hayley_Ormrod</b></a><a href="https://t.co/LYHeNwNIS4" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/LYHeNwNIS4</a></p>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/CharChirico" data-user-id="430005493">

      </span>
  </button>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="750083795634819076" data-item-id="750083795634819076" data-permalink-path="/CharChirico/status/750083795634819076" data-conversation-id="750083795634819076" data-tweet-nonce="750083795634819076-3089320b-a3e9-4312-ab67-7d7bfcd19a9e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="CharChirico" data-name="Cllr Charlotte (Charlie) Chirico" data-user-id="430005493" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="EsterMcVeyMPnot" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;430005493&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CharChirico&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Cllr Charlotte (Charlie) Chirico&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Cllr Charlotte (Charlie) Chirico&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Cllr Charlotte (Charlie) Chirico&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;3242131246&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;EsterMcVeyMPnot&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Esther McVey&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Esther McVey&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Esther McVey&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/CharChirico" data-user-id="430005493">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/961331551421296640/kBJJCWTE_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">

      </div>
    </div>
  </form>
  <p class="embed-tweet-description">By embedding Twitter content in your website or app, you are agreeing to the Twitter <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/overview/terms/agreement" rel="noopener">Developer Agreement</a> and <a href="https://dev.twitter.com/overview/terms/policy" rel="noopener">Developer Policy</a>.</p>
  <h3 class="embed-preview-header">Preview</h3>
  <div class="embed-preview">
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
